name.label: Name of partition
name.tooltip: Name of the partition cannot be changed by user because it is used in linker script generation process

size.label: Size of the current partition
size.tooltip: Size in bytes for the current partition

boot.label: Boot
boot.tooltip: Section need to be loaded in to the RAM

memory.label: Memory location of the current partition
memory.tooltip: Memory location of the current partition can be picked from available memories for current MCU
